'''''Amon Hen'' 227''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-seventh issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[January]] [[2011]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen227.jpg|The House of Tom Bombadil]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional Decorative Artwork
** By: Steve Lines
* Announcements
* Obituary: [[Glen GoodKnight]]
** By: Charles E. Noad
* AGM Announcements
* Along the Road - [[The Return of the Ring|2012 news]]
** By: Lynn Whitaker
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* Artwork: ''[[Riddles in the Dark|The Riddle Game]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* [[Unquendor]] Lustrum Annnouncement
* Reader offer on [[Dimitra Fimi]]'s [[Tolkien, Race and Cultural History: From Fairies to Hobbits|book]]
* Maurice Bowra and the [[Inklings]]
** By: [[Charles Noad|Charles E. Noad]]
* Advert: ''[[Parma Eldalamberon 19]]''
* Artwork: ''[[Chetwood]]''
** By: Jef Murray
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Artwork: ''[[Barrels Out of Bond|Barrel Rider]]''
** By: Jef Murray
